_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The all that is disturbed [sn35.52:1.15]: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
The ear, nose, tongue, body (a causal ch: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by ear contact
The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by nose contact
The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by tongue contact
The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by body contact
The mind [sn35.52:1.15]: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
